title: Rain Ambience & Thunder FX
longDescription:
~ Rain Ambience & Thunder FX ~


Tired of sound effects that don't loop properly?

Are you unsure if your free sample is actually free to use for commercial purposes?

No problem!


This pack contains 152 carefully recorded, mixed and mastered tracks full of rain ambience and thunder effects.


★ Over 2 hours and 47 minutes of audio.

★ 70 Rain/Storm/Wind ambient tracks that loop seamlessly with 100% accuracy!

★ 74 Thunder Effects to blend in with the loops.

★ Loops equalized in different ways to compliment each other when combined.

★ Split into two categories: Loops and SFX.


BONUS MATERIAL

★ Five different "Cave Water Dripping"-loops

★ Three "Water Splashing" SFX.


PREVIEW

https://youtu.be/vnmI-ydxwJM


CONTACT

underponder@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 152

Number of Audio Cues: 152

Full length: 2 hours 47 minutes 36 seconds

Looping: All ambient tracks

Microphones: Zoom H2N & Zoom F1 with SSH-6

DAW: Reaper

Format: .wav

Channels: Stereo

Sample rate: 44100 Hz

Depth: 16 bit PCM

Recorded: 2019 - 2021

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Last time I was told to make 100 more loops/sfx so I did.
The full duration has gone up from 50 minutes to almost 3 hours!
